$WmMPID_マーク男,ch04_22_Marc_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My mother is the greatest tactician to
ever live. Someday, I hope to rival her
when it comes to strategic prowess.$k$p$WmMPID_マーク女,ch04_24_Marc_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Wow... My FATHER is the greatest
tactician to ever live—and I want to
rival HIM someday! ...We match!$k$p$Sbs1000|
